main.name: Kasimir Tanner
main.bio: Machine Learning Engineer in Insurance Pricing. Modelling, optimization and development. Interested in understanding and applying machine learning tools as well as methods from statistical physics. I love programming and making things work. Convivial and systematic problem solver.
